website_summaries.verdict: Simple convertible chair that is more about style than pure functionality. Good for anyone concerned about the interior decor of a room.
pros: A great modernistic style that can spice up a space
Modular design makes it easy to use multiple chairs to create larger couches and sitting areas
cons: When folded down, the surface area lacks the space to comfortably lie down and sleep

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Looking Chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair took about 10 minutes to set up. Looks nice and is comfortable. I have included a picture of what the chair looks like from the back. It looks nice even from behind. I will be picking up the matching ottoman very soon. The chair is a little lower than I would have hoped for. Other than that, it's a great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Bekrah

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece if they send the correct set of legs
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent piece ... light enough to move easily but generally sturdy. I would have given it a 5 star rating had it not had two pair of the same legs. I was able to drill new holes to attach the one set of legs but it doesn't look as cute as the photos because the one set of legs looks off kilter. I bought it as used - like new - in original box but obviously it was a return because of the legs error. Needed to use it immediately so didn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: MaryLee

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is good bang for you buck.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've found for the money, the seat feels like it might lose firmness if I weighed more then 225 lbs, already notice slight loss of firmness. Back has three settings of incline which is nice, great for my small for appartment. Update. 3months after purchase and use. So there definitely is a loss of firmness which seems due to lack of spring supporting the cushion. Opend the bottom and the support are very minimal. There is also a wood beam running the the middle of the seat. That can be felt while sitting. Definitely better deal when the chair was cheaper. Needs some tweaks.
customer_reviews.author: Descretion is key

customer_reviews.title: Love it, take out of box
customer_reviews.text: Love it, take out of box, screws were under board, fold out and screw in 4 legs, that was about it. Quite light I guess, makes it easy to move when moving to new house or apt time to time. I had a very heavy couch/bed which was heavy to move compared to this. And if you buy another, you can stick together. I was thinking these are not much different from walmart, they are cheaper if they have them in stock and style, while amazon can be pricey lately sometimes, even if straight from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: kaori

customer_reviews.title: Love it, was more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Just received item. Took about 10 minutes to put together. Love it, was more than I expected. Bought it to use as a cocktail table, so will be buying trays to sit on top. Nice inexpensive ottoman
customer_reviews.author: Kikigreen

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman! I bought this Ottoman to go with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ottoman! I bought this Ottoman to go with the Emily Convertible Futon. I got both packages on the same day. It took me about 15 mins to put this together. I originally could not tell which leg was right or left so I put them on backwards, the extra time was due to unscrewing. It is a little bit higher than the couch but other than that it's perfect! Very soft to touch and cushion-y.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: I liked a lot
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, I loved I wish the material has some shine because it’s totally matte, but it’s still very beautiful and made my room look modern
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Beautiful chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is beautiful. Very good quality. Easy to assemble. Less than 10 minutes. Unfortunately had to return it because it was too big for the area we needed the chair for.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Very please
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed by this ottoman. I absolutely love it and it was super easy to put together. At first I thought they forgot to send me the legs but the legs is tucked under the ottoman in a zipped up compartment which I thought was cool after laughing at myself for feeling frustrated thinking the legs didn’t come with it. After I set it up I was very pleased with the quality and overall look. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made. Not sturdy. Does not match the futon it's paired with. It's a piece of junk and a waste of money. Tried to return it, but they would not accept it, so I'm stuck with this piece of junk that doesn't even match my futon
customer_reviews.author: V.I.P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect our family room
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is a bit taller and wider than I expected but it only took 5 minutes to put together and is substantial. Matches our real leather furniture even though it’s faux leather and is sturdy. Another reviewer said the holes for bolts for the legs didn’t line up but they definitely do. You just have to position them correctly as shown in the photos I attached. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but broke a month later now can only use for foot rear
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What Is Expected
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect height, and good quality for fake leather. I have very contemporary furniture to the extreme, and it fits in very well which was my major concern when I ordered it. It would fit in modern styles as well.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF CATS
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman! I had an empty space in my living room and this fit it perfectly! it's great size and beautiful. It says it has storgae but it only has a litte pocket in the bottom, you can't open it like i thought you could. Beware of pets!! My cat loves this as muh as i do, so keep clawing it and well it damages the leather
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: So small
customer_reviews.text: This is like so small —the pics are so Deceiving— we didn’t realize it cause we didn’t unbox it for couple months. It was to late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E

customer_reviews.title: Broke less than a year
customer_reviews.text: So I've had this for less than a year. Looks-wise, it's great. However it cannot support much weight at all; my friend and I sat down on it to put on our shoes and within SECONDS the legs snapped off and ripped off parts of the wooden beam it was attached to. It was a good chair but I had no idea it was so delicate...
customer_reviews.author: Ming S.

customer_reviews.title: Put your feet up...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I did before - I feel like I have always had these - I can't live without them! ...or choose to place a tray on top when entertaining company... I have two - One is MINE!!!
customer_reviews.author: MyMoJo

customer_reviews.title: I like this ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I like this ottoman. It is very pretty and it was easy to put together. However, it is a bit taller than the seat of the matching couch and one of the legs seems to be a bit shorter than the others. Strangely this isn't noticeable when you sit on it or prop your feet up on it so I figured it wasn't much of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McDougalle

customer_reviews.title: . It is a real garbage.
customer_reviews.text: poor quality, poor after-sales service, poor customer service and little seriousness. Do not lose money, time buying this product. It is a real garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but great deal and would recommend if you have a similar ...
customer_reviews.text: Ended up getting two of these. Amazon upped the price on me for the second purchase by a couple bucks...but great deal and would recommend if you have a similar couch to go with.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: As soon as i opened the box little white bugs ...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as i opened the box little white bugs came crawling out of it so i didnt even both to put it together and sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Nice Looking; Issue with Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this appears to be a very sturdy product. Doesn't look cheap and very easy assembly. Reason for the 4 stars is because I received this product with the silica gel beads scattered outside of their usual packaging. While this typically would not be an issue, the beads managed to get inside of the cushioned section of the Ottoman resulting in a very annoying sound of beads every time the Ottoman is moved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and comfortable. After I place the order I was starting not to be so sure because I was going over the review and there was a lots of negative reviews. I am glad I read the reviews afterwards because I love it big time! It looks expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Great value especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Really great ottoman and stylish too!! Extremely easy to assemble - took me about 10 minutes. I’m very very happy with my purchase. Also larger than it seems in pictures but maybe that’s just me.
customer_reviews.author: flow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair to play guitar on
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my music room. Perfect chair to play guitar on. Comfortable and looks nice. Can't beat this chair for the price. It is not the best quality chair you can find, but nicer than you would think for $100. Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice kinda hard to put together on directions hAd to read others reviews
customer_reviews.author: Scalise

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This stool is great! It came Quickly, was well packaged and 2 people can sit at a time. We placed it by the front door so folks could sit to take off snow boots and the like, very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: BunnieHill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting much but oh man was I surprised at the quality and the packaging. The attention to detail is crazy, it comes in a protective bag and there’s even a “pocket” inside the ottoman you can keep the legs and hardware for storage or when moving.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Just Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Best 70 bucks I ever spent. Looks, feels great. Buy it. You will not be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ottoman. It looks expensive but isn't I have received compliments.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice,  fits in well with real leather.
customer_reviews.text: Nice in size, goes nicely with black leather as a center piece.

customer_reviews.title: a nice place to put your feet up for 60 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Smells funny for a few days; other than that a nice place to put your feet up for 60 bucks. Easy to assemble, one hole for a screw was slightly off center. Sturdy. I am 280 lbs and sit on it; so far hasn't broke.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is wonderful. Easy to assemble, lovely size. It does slide on the floor fairly easily though because it does not weigh much

customer_reviews.title: The Black Faux Leather Ottoman is Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful ottoman. The faux leather looks and feel like real leather. The ottoman was very easy and quick to put together.

customer_reviews.title: The item was perfect. It looks beautiful and not cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by reading the reviews. We received it in a well-packaged box. The item was perfect. It looks beautiful and not cheap looking. The legs are located in the underside of the seat in a zippered pouch. Took about 5 minutes to assemble. We love it and use it as an ottoman and occasionally I sit on it. Would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Ottoman. Nice leather feel and easy to clean. I three of it.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice mid-size convertible chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mid-size convertible chair. The back can be positioned at multiple angles. It's a good size. The only critiques I have are: * Some people might not like how firm the built-in cushions are - it's not something you'd be able to easily fall asleep on. I don't mind because that just means it will last longer. * The fabric used will show dirt and grease stains plainly. You will need to keep it clean w. moist towl & a little soap to avoid looking grungy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy. Delivery was quick! Sturdy enough to sit on.

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to put together and it was great

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this chair for my mom for temporary purposes. She hated it. She hates anything that isn't antique. So we set it up in our home for the kids. Then we stole it from them. It was of much better quality than I thought it would be, and it's big enough for two adults to sit comfortably on it. I genuinely love this chair!

customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Easy assembly, no problems. The legs are great on wood floor, no scratching. Surprisingly quality materials.

customer_reviews.title: nice quality, solid piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ottoman to go with the matching chair, together they make a nice chaise lounge, very enjoyable. This ottoman is top quality and very large. The ottoman is basically the same size as the chair, just without the back cushion piece. Very sturdy and solid. I love it, the only bad thing I have noticed is that finger prints show up real easy on this set, strange seeing finer prints so easily on furniture, I find myself whipping it down every other day or so, overall I highly recommend this ottoman it looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in OK

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my office
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and looks great in my office. I got this chair for my daughter, who spends a lot of time in my office in the afternoons. It easily lays flat or props up at different levels. It's not the softest or most comfortable chair, which is why I gave it 4 stars, but it's easy to maintain, fits well in the corner, and is far more comfortable than our hard plastic office chairs. I've gotten a ton of compliments on my office since I got it. :)
customer_reviews.author: LEA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to screw in four legs and it's really soft 'leather' and nice firm base.

customer_reviews.title: I think this unit is not comfortable. I have it in my room and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this unit is not comfortable. I have it in my room and I continue watching my TV from my PC chair and avoid this chair... Looks OK. The material is a little bit glossy, so my fingerprints are visible- which is weird. Also, it was ripped in couple of placed upon arrival, I decided to use the black marker to cover imperfections instead of RMA hassle. I guess I got what I paid for. Update: reduced to 1 star. The material is prone to wear and tear. Really bad quality
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: great buy. After my kids destroyed my previous expensive living room furniture set, I vowed I would not buy another expensive set for them just to destroy. When I found this, I said PERFECT! I ordered 2... they arrived fast, was super easy to assemble and then enjoyed the item very fast after arrival. they look good!!!.... and for the price, i'm not worried about my kids destroying them. Sturdy legs, quality material , very pleased!

product_meta.title: DHP Chelsea Convertible Accent Chair with Pillow, Black Faux Leather
product_meta.description: Style:Accent ChairIt is easy to love DHP's Chelsea Faux Leather Chair in black. With its contemporary charm and modern flair, the chair will add personality to any deacute corner. With its multi-position back, the Chelsea Chair provides versatility.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars356 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
